description:
Syo admires the teacher of the S Class and currently active idol Hyuga Ryuya.
News of an amateur audition to co-star with him comes flying into the academy.
However, due to Syo`s fatal weakness, his odds of getting the part seem hopeless.
When Haruka and her friends discover this, they formulate a plan to help Syo overcome his weakness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full Throttle Chivalrous Spirit Go! Fight!!
